attributes.additional_details: We are sitting on a timebomb of young peole who will have serious lung damage and other health issues, vaping also causes sleep issues and can lead to anxiety and depression. We need to ban them or if not possible make them harder to buy. They are at shop till shelves next to sweets for a couple of pounds.
attributes.background: There is a big trend for young people to start vaping as so cheap and comes in loads of sweet flavours making it more than cigarettes.  It is also advertised on the vape shops as being safe, which is not the case.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for a similar action:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/638536
